Description:
Identifies IPs from which users grant access to other users on azure resources and alerts when a previously unseen source IP address is used.

Author: sawwinnnaung
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Rare Subscription-level Operations In Azure
Query: sourcetype='azure-activitylogs' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts/listkeys/action%' or log like '%microsoft.maps/accounts/listkeys/action%' or log like '%microsoft.media/mediaservices/listkeys/action%' or log like '%microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts/listkeys/action%' or log like '%microsoft.storage/storageaccounts/listkeys/action%' or log like '%microsoft.compute/snapshots/write%' or log like '%microsoft.network/networksecuritygroups/write%')
